issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

fields.summary: Ensure REPL DUMP and REPL LOAD are authorized properly

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description: "repl dump" does not provide db/table information. That is necessary for authorization replication in ranger.
fields.summary: Repl dump should pass in db/table information to authorization API

ATTACHMENT ID: 12879547 - PreCommit-HIVE-Build

ReplicationSemanticAnalyzer - Since the location is not specified by user, we don't need to check access to it.
ReplDumpTask - matches* methods - "public static"  (instead of "static public") is recommended sun convention (and therefore hive convention).
ReplicationSemanticAnalyzer calling static method in ReplDumpTask is little unintuitive. How about moving that method to a higher level utils class ? Maybe org.apache.hadoop.hive.ql.parse.repl.dump.Utils class ?
